document_data.name: Mihstu
document_data.mainbody: '''Mihstu''' ({{Pronounce|MIS|too|refs={{Cite dragon/93/Ay pronunseeAYshun gyd|28}}}}) were a type of [[elemental]] creature of [[air]].
document_data.Description: Mihstu had a cloud-like appearance, being swirling mists {{SI|6|ft|long=yes}} in diameter that could shape their bodies at will and seep through the smallest of cracks or openings.
document_data.Abilities: The bodies of these creatures were impervious to harm from electrical-based attacks, ''[[magic missile]]'', or missile weaponry. And they could only be harmed by weapons with a ''+2 or greater [[item enchantment|enchantment]]''. Cold-based [[spell]]s and abilities would temporarily stun them.
document_data.Combat: Mihstu tyically fought other creatures in two ways. The first was would shaping their body to form four solid tentacles with razor-sharp talons. The second was to envelop their victim in their body and gradually drain away their constitution.

Society.Homelands: Mihstu were almost never encountered anywhere but on the [[Elemental Plane of Air]].  Though some claimed to have occasionally encountered them in the [[Great Conflagration]], most likely in an elemental pocket of air.<ref> Whenever they were found on the [[Prime Material plane]], it was in cool, damp places that had little or no sunlight.
Society.Relationships: Despite their solitary nature, some mihstu were known to work for [[magic-user]]s in exchange for powerful [[magic item]]s.
